title: Question on Popstar Ahri
body:
Is she or is she not wearing stockings? {{champion:103}} 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/pahri-articlebanner_1.jpg?itok=4M4wtaDc

My friend and I are having a debate.
I am for no stockings
He is for stockings.
Everyone I ask is saying stockings but I say that's because of shading.
The in-game character model is not wearing stockings, confirmed by my friend who is saying stockings.
How does the splash art and the game model character not match...? like what?

replies.body: She's totally wearing tights both in game and in the splash. :3
The queen has spoken. Also @KateyKhaos when is pop star ahri gonna be renamed to Ahrianna Grande?

> [{quoted}](name=SmknWdl,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZgXR1ud3,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-04-14T21:40:13.589+0000)
>
> The queen has spoken. Also @KateyKhaos when is pop star ahri gonna be renamed to Ahrianna Grande?

I've always called it Popstahri.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=ZgXR1ud3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-14T17:37:15.015+0000)
>
> She's totally wearing tights both in game and in the splash. :3

Is Ravenborn Leblanc wearing tights too?
Looks like stocking in game, to me. Not sure about the splash, it's more subtle

Who cares if she is wearing stockings or not, I just want Challenger {{champion:103}}  to come back, I deserve that skin. Please Riot if you love your players you will do this. I n eeeeeeed iiitttt!!!!!!!!!!!
